frontmatter.title: How do you draw such straight lines?

markdownRemark.html:
To draw straight lines on the iPad I use whatever straight edge I have laying around: ruler, book, piece of cardboard, notepad, etc. I have a few Paper by FiftyThree journal pages of “frames” that I duplicate1 anytime I need them. Saves me the step of having to redraw the same thing over and over again.

Think Kit update

With the addition of the Think Kit tools in Paper drawing straight lines and shapes is even easier (no rulers needed). Simply select the Diagram pen and watch as your scribbles autocorrect them self.
